channel.title: Elder PK BETA [xEnts Source]
channel.description:
Hi,
We have decided to release Elder PK BETA which uses the massivly popular source xEnt made for Beyond RSC so all props go to xEnt.
We havnt had chance to edit much yet, so its basically what xEnt released as BRSC. We are in the process of adding our own additions to it such as capture the flag, new training areas and such.
[b]Promotion[/b] As part of a limited time only offer, we are offering you 50mil experience and 3 sets of rune and some runes to pk with while beta runs for afew days. No wipes will happen, everything you have during beta you will keep. Message "Jakob" when online.
If you were not lucky enough to play BeyondRSC then here are afew pics of the greatest pking based source that RSPS has ever seen.
Starting items in the bank [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1z2hlli.jpg[/img]
Edge portal - flats pking is at Skellys [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24de9h2.jpg[/img]
Edge shop [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/a29pnn.jpg[/img]
Stat Editer [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/spxekj.jpg[/img]
Country flats [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/263jznn.jpg[/img]
City teleports [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ncjz9k.jpg[/img]
This of all these drops? [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/116mjat.jpg[/img]
[b]Other Features.[/b]
Partys - Join partys to share XP with other players so you gain it at an increased rate - 4 per party
Death announcements - Whoever killed whoever is announced in the top right of the client.
Stop loot being displayed.
Fog of war on/off.
[b]Events[/b]
We play on having regular events, such as:
[b]Smack the admin[/b] - Everyone wears full addy, an admin in rune with no weapon and 99 def runs around while people catch and try to kill him and your rivels. The admin will drop an expensive weapon or money when he dies, then whos left fights out amongst themselves until whoever has it gets away or the last man is left standing.
[b]Wars[/b] - Flats wars, Level 50 wars, Pure wars and mage wars. Depending on how many people attend decides the value of the prize.
[/b]DML - Death match league[/b] - A staff member will attend all DML fights to record the winner. Each week the leader will recieve a prize.
[b]Clan Wars[/b] - We encourage you to come and bring your clans, if your clan has 10 or more active members you will recieve your own privet password protected forum. We aim to house 4 major clans.
[b]Website[/b] - www.project-elder.com [b]Client Download[/b] - http://www.mediafire.com/?zn44nztwmxm
We will be updating the codes that are being written now at the weekend and minor ones between them, remember to pm ingame "Jakob" for your free xp/3sets of rune or add jake@iwillstealyour.info to msn and ask there.
[b]ALL RIGHTS RESERVED ON OUR BETA SOURCE TO XENT - RL Admin[/b]

Tbh all of you are leeching Reines and Jagex so Luke don’t bother crying when people leech. You’re also trying to make a server to copy the real thing. I’m not bashing you but bring some meat to the table because that point was void.

item.title: Elder PK BETA [xEnts Source]
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

TBH, i don’t care that people leech my work and host it (i expected it, otherwise i would not have released it). It would have been stored on my computer rotting away and i knew some people would want it. Since i didn’t have the patients to deal with the community and run BeyondRSCv2 maybe someone else can, the entire server is out there now and it only takes a good admin and some advertising for it to become better than i had it.

though it’s somewhat annoying that people will host it and change the name all just to make some money (don’t get me wrong, 50% of the reason why i made BeyondRSC was for personal gain, the other 50% for friends and others that wanted a decent PK server)

If anyone feels guilty or generous for doing what i said above, i have my pockets open

Read full topic

item.title: Elder PK BETA [xEnts Source]
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:4, topic:334082”]I never blamed xEnt, I thought it was cool that he released it, but I do blame idiots running a source code with absolutely no modifications what-so-ever yet renaming it to their own server, to basically advertise their two existing servers that they run off the same site.

Why is Pets smartening up? What has xEnt achieved by releasing it? Absolutely nothing except a few idiots scrolling through the source trying to find bits they can copy and paste to EasyRSC, and the rest planning to make identical servers like this kid. Why does it matter if he’s receiving X PMs? I don’t understand.

Also, why did Reines/Stork kill anything? Reines didn’t want his source code released. What did he do wrong?

PS. Yes, you’re right, all I do is database management. I stare at phpMyAdmin, and that’s it. It’s a fucking miracle what you can do from phpMyAdmin these days.[/quote]

Look at what you’re saying bro:

“…but I do blame idiots running a source code with absolutely no modifications what-so-ever yet renaming it to their own server, to basically advertise their two existing servers that they run off the same site.”

“Why is Pets smartening up? What has xEnt achieved by releasing it? Absolutely nothing except a few idiots scrolling through the source trying to find bits they can copy and paste to EasyRSC, and the rest planning to make identical servers like this kid.”

I don’t need to be repetitive when I say, this is Moparscape. People leech off each other, rename someones work and releases it (RS2 section). Leeches will always find a to get what they want, look at darscape for example. Guy gets a fucking orgasm every time code is released…

This is a result of open-source garbage, but then again there will always be the 75% retard population and maybe a couple people getting the job done.

@Pets smartening up, Why does it matter if he’s receiving X PMs? I don’t understand.

Simple, he’s (probably) wanting to expand the near dead development or just grown tired of the scene (most decent programmers have). Never said it mattered that he (again assuming) probably getting numerous counts of emails asking for the RSCAngel source, but one would have to assume it doesn’t help.

@Also, why did Reines/Stork kill anything? Reines didn’t want his source code released. What did he do wrong?

Never said they did anything wrong, but any actual development died with their servers considering they pretty much got the scene going. Plus, most if not all decent programmers that were active quit long ago, so really all these people have left is random code snippets that were copied from a easyRSC source.

Read full topic

xEnt released it for the public. I’m pretty sure most of you downloaded it. Who gives a shit. He hosted it! Do you really think it’s going to draw all of your players away from your servers? If you do, then you should just give up. The gaming world is all based on competition, or there would be no fun.

Fucktwits.

item.title: Elder PK BETA [xEnts Source]
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:17, topic:334065”]Wow the lot of you are fucking retarded, especially Kryptix.

Moparscape has always supported open source development (look at their RS2 section), you didn’t think for a second RSC would end up that way? The development is dead, it died long ago with Reines/Stork/whoever the fuck killed it, Pets is actually smartening up if he’s releasing since he probably gets 500505020052050 pm’s asking for the source.

Kryptix: You’ve done absolutely NOTHING other than back end edits and database management, why you’re even talking is hypocritical considering you yourself are using someone else’s work, whether this mopar wants to release someone else’s work is not up to any of us, and is inevitable.

Point is: Quit complaining, you should be kissing xEnt’s ass for releasing what most of you couldn’t even do for years.[/quote]
dam that was well said jolly good show

Read full topic
